message: Let's start with a fair split. What do you think?
I'll give you a small portion, but I think I deserve more.
That's not very generous. I'm not willing to accept such an uneven split so early on.
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm still hoping for a more balanced split.
I'm taking a risk, but I think I deserve the majority.
Are you kidding me? That's an outrageously uneven split. I'm not going to let you take 90% of the money without a fight.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to give you a free pass to take the majority. This is my best offer so far.
I'll give you a small consolation prize, but I'm not going to back down.
You're not even trying to be fair. I'm not going to accept a paltry 20% of the money. I think you can do better than that.
I'm willing to make a serious concession, but I'm not going to give you a huge majority. This is my final offer before I start getting aggressive.
I'm going all in, you're getting a tiny share.
Are you kidding me? You think I'm going to accept a paltry 5% of the money? I'd rather walk away with nothing than accept this insulting offer.
I'm taking control of the negotiation. You're getting a tiny share, and I'm taking the majority. This is my final offer.
I'm willing to give up, but I want to make sure you know I'm not happy about it.
Ha! I win! You should have accepted my previous offer when you had the chance. Better luck next time, Bob.
